sheet.event: Girls Night Out x Candy Shop
sheet.desc:
Bar Rouge and MVP Shanghai bring you Girls Night Out Candy Shop Edition on 9th March.

This week Bar Rouge will turn into a candy shop where shirtless male model will offer sweets to ladies all night With DJ John Avolio behind the deck playing your favourite tunes, dancers and waiters on the floor, girls get simply the best.
Tasty cocktails and manicure service and lucky draw, free for all the ladies.

Free entrance until 00:30, tasty cocktails, manicure service and lucky drawğŸ, free for all the ladies. ğŸ’‹.
Dress code elegant.
